=======台灣佬花弗爆料==============

嚇左嚇 望下自己既RMX 750(2018)求佢生性先..
以後買牛真係要睇OEM由邊間做了屌你老母GW搞臭我海盜船名聲

https://www.ptt.cc/bbs/PC_Shopping/M.1590344145.A.50D.htm

作者saes087364 (saes087364)
看板PC_Shopping
標題[心得] 海盜船 SF750 爆一次不夠 你有爆第二次嗎
時間Mon May 25 02:15:43 2020


沒錯
又是你1950
就你問題最多

先附上出海證明
https://i.imgur.com/edapbJF.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/LmtoopH.jpg

第一顆可能因為剛買新電腦
用得比較兇
一個月就爆了

狀況是
剛睡醒按下開機鍵
直接出現像是有人一口氣踩爆十層保麗龍的聲響
原本睡眼惺忪的我瞬間驚醒
因為是在剛睡醒的狀況下去按
以為聽錯所以就再按一次
然後就再爆一次
這次還可以清楚看到火花從後面噴發出來

所以就帶去原購買處出任務
盒子裡面沒有AHQ保卡的幾乎都是聯強代理
聯強處理速度很快
含假日不到一星期直接換新給我
當時也還沒有SF750炸兩次的文章
以為只是自己衰小
於是第二顆裝上去就一直用到前幾天

第二顆可能是因為使用頻率沒這麼頻繁
這次撐到快兩個月才爆
而且中途有經過5月初的連環爆文章
發現這顆也是1950
就開始在等他什麼時候會爆

這顆比較特別的是
跟多數人剛開機就爆不太一樣
是在我剛開機使用約10分鐘之後才爆的
所以是在我完全沒有心理準備的情況下嚇到我

目前就是跟第二張單子備註的一樣
請聯強或海盜聯絡我
不要再給我1950之後的
我會怕.jpg
按下開機鍵都有陰影了

再加上遭逢假日
直接送修後去原X屋買顆金鋼彈回去
跟SF750的編織線比起來還是有些差別
但是現在只求電腦能用就好

而且真正的SFX規格好像也只有這幾顆能選
看到那串文章底下有人還說賊船應該有召回了吧
我只能說
要是有召回換新
我還需要去開什麼鋼彈嗎==
鋼彈近期要是銷售變好
還真要謝謝賊船放幾張爆爆博士在裡面

第一次上船就翻船
不幸中的大幸只有壞電源而已
其它硬體目前使用上沒出現異樣

在此奉勸1950梯的同志們
不是不爆 時候未到

先找好你手邊的購買證明跟代理商資料
隨時都有可能會用到


感謝閱讀
賊船

replies.msg:
海盜船PSU總監回應: No offense, but you know absolutely nothing about what you are speaking of.

1st: Seasonic, FSP and Delta do NOT manufacture in Taiwan. They are merely Taiwan based. In fact, ALL power supplies for ATX/SFX PC's are manufactured in China. Even factories in Taiwan and Vietnam use "semi-knockdown kits" (SKD) that were initially made in China and only the final assembly is done off short.

2nd: Seasonic isn't even a tier one. They have great engineering, but PCBA, etc. is all outsourced. Only final assembly is done at Seasonic's CHINA factory.

3rd: If FSP made a PSU as good as Great Wall, Corsair would use them. But FSP is hung up on their active clamp reset forward topology and until they decide to enter the 21st century and use LLC resonant like everyone else, they're out of contention.

4th: Delta is too focused on producing for white box PSUs for the likes of Dell, etc. You'll note that there hasn't been a Delta made retail unit in nearly a decade (Antec?)

5th: Great Wall is not "third class". In fact, they're actually a tier one. All of their manufacturing is done in house. They're actually the largest PSU manufacturer in China.

海盜船PSU總監回應: No offense, but you know absolutely nothing about what you are speaking of.

1st: Seasonic, FSP and Delta do NOT manufacture in Taiwan. They are merely Taiwan based. In fact, ALL power supplies for ATX/SFX PC's are manufactured in China. Even factories in Taiwan and Vietnam use "semi-knockdown kits" (SKD) that were initially made in China and only the final assembly is done off short.

2nd: Seasonic isn't even a tier one. They have great engineering, but PCBA, etc. is all outsourced. Only final assembly is done at Seasonic's CHINA factory.

3rd: If FSP made a PSU as good as Great Wall, Corsair would use them. But FSP is hung up on their active clamp reset forward topology and until they decide to enter the 21st century and use LLC resonant like everyone else, they're out of contention.

4th: Delta is too focused on producing for white box PSUs for the likes of Dell, etc. You'll note that there hasn't been a Delta made retail unit in nearly a decade (Antec?)

5th: Great Wall is not "third class". In fact, they're actually a tier one. All of their manufacturing is done in house. They're actually the largest PSU manufacturer in China.

倒米

replies.msg:
噚日FSP 抽佢水
https://www.facebook.com/226259740795522/posts/2947368585351277/?d=n

https://forum.gamer.com.tw/C.php?bsn=60030&snA=551983&tnum=3

樓主 港都狼仔 trumpet推130 噓-
14 小時前
這次鬧很大的海盜SF750開機時炸裂事件，就是一次側APFC(主動功率因數修正)電路的二極體所使用的絕緣導熱墊絕緣性能變差，導致開機時APFC電路升壓後，該絕緣墊被高壓擊穿，使二極體與散熱片短路而發出火花及爆裂聲

目前電源供應器，一次側(包含APFC)區域，常用的功率元件有兩種封裝，一種是TO-220，一種是TO-220FP(FullPAK)，如下圖所示，最左邊的TO-220因為外露金屬部分與下方其中一個接腳相通，所以安裝在金屬散熱片上時就需要加上絕緣螺絲墊片及絕緣導熱墊，以免對散熱片形成短路。但右邊三顆的TO-220FP，因為採全絕緣封裝，所以可以直接安裝在金屬散熱片上，而不用加上絕緣螺絲墊片及絕緣導熱墊

那這兩種封裝有什麼差別呢?以下用Infineon IPx50R190CE這款功率元件來當成範例，這型號功率元件有分成三種， TO-247叫做IPW50R190CE，TO-220叫做IPP50R190CE，TO-220FP叫做IPA50R190CE，但是正面的元件標記都只印5R190CE

既然都叫5R190CE，其主要特性都是相同的，但是封裝會影響如Power Dissipation等規格參數，這個參數是指在規定的散熱條件下，功率元件本身可以連續承受的最大功率，這裡可以看到TO-247/TO-220以及TO-220FP的可承受最大功率相差很多

那為什麼封裝會影響最大承受功率呢?因為TO-247/TO-220內部半導體晶粒的熱量可以從外露金屬部分傳導出來，所以從晶粒到外殼及晶粒到環境的熱阻很小。TO-220FP因為整個半導體晶粒都用環氧樹脂包住，整個熱阻就高上許多，因為熱阻大，導熱不易，所以可承受最大功率就必須要下修，避免內部晶粒因為過熱而損壞

不過TO-220FP因為整個都是環氧樹脂包覆，其外殼有很高的絕緣耐壓，這也是為什麼TO-220FP安裝在金屬散熱片上時不用絕緣螺絲墊片及絕緣導熱墊

回到主題，因為目前電源採高效率化設計，可讓功率元件本身承受功率值大幅下降，所以比起早期機種，同樣功率的高效率電源允許使用較小Power Dissipation的功率元件，但是部分體積較小或大輸出功率的電源供應器，為了讓功率元件在散熱條件較差(散熱片較小/內部較擁擠等)，或是連續高功率輸出下，能有更大的承受功率餘裕範圍，會採用TO-220封裝功率元件，但是如果發生異物/濕氣/灰塵等接觸在TO-220外露金屬及散熱片之間，因為該處電壓接近DC400V左右，所以就可能會發生功率元件與散熱片發生短路/跳火的現象，這時功率元件就會被短路大電流擊穿而損壞，電源供應器就無法運作
下方圖片，為一款SFX小型化高功率電源供應器，箭頭所指處就是功率元件外露金屬與散熱片間發生跳火，導致該處燒黑並擊穿功率元件，也造成電源供應器故障，必須送修


結論：
因為台灣環境與氣候因素，導致異物/濕氣/灰塵入侵電源供應器的機率大增，雖然有廠商已經開始在電路板上使用三防塗料，但功率元件與金屬散熱片之間的絕緣同樣重要，如何加強功率元件絕緣性，同時保有較大承受功率餘裕及較低熱阻，是電源廠商要研究的課題，同時也能降低因為這類損壞導致使用者必須送修或更換的機率
海盜這款SF750雖沒實際摸過，但看照片料還不差，堆料堆好堆滿，APFC MOSFET居然還用上TO-247的功率元件(雖然只有一顆)，沒想到一片沒幾毛的絕緣導熱墊就砸了整鍋好菜

報告完畢，謝謝收看
seasonic忠實用家

1st: Seasonic, FSP and Delta do NOT manufacture in Taiwan. They are merely Taiwan based. In fact, ALL power supplies for ATX/SFX PC's are manufactured in China. Even factories in Taiwan and Vietnam use "semi-knockdown kits" (SKD) that were initially made in China and only the final assembly is done off short.

2nd: Seasonic isn't even a tier one. They have great engineering, but PCBA, etc. is all outsourced. Only final assembly is done at Seasonic's CHINA factory.

3rd: If FSP made a PSU as good as Great Wall, Corsair would use them. But FSP is hung up on their active clamp reset forward topology and until they decide to enter the 21st century and use LLC resonant like everyone else, they're out of contention.

4th: Delta is too focused on producing for white box PSUs for the likes of Dell, etc. You'll note that there hasn't been a Delta made retail unit in nearly a decade (Antec?)

5th: Great Wall is not "third class". In fact, they're actually a tier one. All of their manufacturing is done in house. They're actually the largest PSU manufacturer in China.
